messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] look to the moon
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks so much for this. The moon has always been very special to me. BTW - tonight, I believe is Harvest Moon. Janis ... From: mc1mommy@aol.com To:
messages.messageBody:
Thanks so much for this. The moon has always been very special to me.
BTW - tonight, I believe is Harvest Moon.
Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: mc1mommy@...
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, September 09, 2003 10:49 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] look to the moon


Hi,
A short while ago, a mom was missing her child and Janis advised her to
look to the moon. I liked that; it reminded me of the song from the movie with
Fievel.
I recently discovered that the moon is home to places with very beautiful
names:
Bay of Dew
Bay of Rainbows
Lake of Dreams
Sea of Serenity
Sea of Nectar
Sea of Humors
Sea of Showers
Just something to ponder next time we look to the moon.
Mary J
